column1: #Text=" Bolin says : " Well , are n't you sweet , little monk child .
#Text=" Meelo says : " What 's that fuzzy creature ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " That is a fire ferret .
#Text=An arboreal mammal common to the bamboo forest of the central Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thanks for sending the Air Acolytes to help us with the move .
#Text=" Asami says : " Yes , they 've been amazing .
